string.name: desc
string.value:
Engraves the owner's name on a piece of equipment. #cDrag the item icon on to the equipment piece of your choice# to engrave your character's name on it. 
Cannot be used on previously engraved equipment.
If used on an item with a crafter's name attached, #cthe crafter's name will be overwritten with the newest name#. 
Cannot be used on Zero weapons.

string.name: desc
string.value:
#c*Warning: If you do not have an empty Character slot, it cannot be used.#

If you are over #cLevel 30#, a new Level 30 character can be created in your world.You can choose one of the following classes #c(Warrior, Magician, Thief, Bowman and Pirate)# at #c1st Job status#.

If you are over #cLevel 30#, a new Level 30 character can be created in your world. You can choose one of the following classes #c(Warrior, Magician, Thief, Bowman and Pirate)# at #c1st Job status.#

In addition, if you list items that #cyou wish to purchase#, another player can sell those items at this shop. #cWhen an item is sold, you will be notified via chat window.# \n#cUnpurchaseable Items#: Equipment items and cash items with expirations. \nThe Granny's Food Stand of World Discount Sale Tab can be purchased #c1 Time#per Nexon ID.

string.name: desc
string.value:
Allows you to create a character of any currently available class, with the exception of Cygnus Knights. Allows you to create a character with an item that will level the character up to Lv. 50 (Cygnus Knights excluded)
Can only be purchased using a character that's Lv. 50 or higher, and there must be a free character slot. After purchase, a character with an item that can level it up to Lv. 50 is created in the world where the purchase was made.
On the character screen, you will see a transparent character with the "Click" sign.
#cBe careful when using the level-up item, as SP (Skill Point) cannot be obtained if you do not do the job advancements.#

string.name: desc
string.value:
Allows you to create a character of any currently available class, with the exception of Cygnus Knights. Allows you to create a character with an item that will level the character up to Lv. 100 (Cygnus Knights excluded)
Can only be purchased using a character that's Lv. 100 or higher, and there must be a free character slot. After purchase, a character with an item that can level it up to Lv. 100 is created in the world where the purchase was made.
On the character screen, you will see a transparent character with the "Click" sign.
#cBe careful when using the level-up item, as SP (Skill Point) cannot be obtained if you do not do the job advancements.#

string.name: desc
string.value:
Perfume for Pets.
The buff you get will depend on the number of pets summoned when the perfume is first used.
1: Weapon Attack, Magic Attack +3 for 2 hours
2: Weapon Attack, Magic Attack +8 for 2 hours
3: Weapon Attack, Magic Attack +15 for 2 hours
This buff stacks with other buffs, but not with other Pet Perfume buffs.

string.name: desc
string.value:
Perfume for Pets.
The buff you get will depend on the number of pets summoned when the perfume is first used.
1: Attack Speed Grade +2 for 2 hours
2: Attack Speed Grade +3 for 2 hours
3: Attack Speed Grade +4 for 2 hours
This buff stacks with other buffs, but not with other Pet Perfume buffs.

string.name: desc
string.value:
Perfume for Pets.
The buff you get will depend on the number of pets summoned when the perfume is first used.
1: Levels of all skills currently in possession +3 for 2 hours
2: Levels of all skills currently in possession +4 for 2 hours
3: Levels of all skills currently in possession +5 for 2 hours
This buff stacks with other buffs, but not with other Pet Perfume buffs.

string.name: desc
string.value: A magical shield that protects an item. Using this on a piece of equipment with a #cLevel 105 requirement or less# protects it from being destroyed by a failed scroll #c1 time#. Protection also disappears after a successful scroll use, and it #ccannot be used on items that have been successfully enhanced 12 or more times or on the superior items.# \nCan be used along with #cShield Scrolls and Guardian Scrolls#.

string.name: desc
string.value: When return scroll is used through #cdrag and drop# before a scroll is used, #cdepending on the choice# in case the scroll works or not, returns the #call the options except for potential ability# back to #cBefore using the scroll.# \n But, #citem options# changed from using #scrolls which reduces upgrade availability counts# can be returned. Whether it has succeeded or failed, the return scrool effect is gone after one usage. \nAso, #cTutorial equipment items# and some items are prohibited from the usage, and cannot be used together with #cSafety shield#.

string.value: This item lets you shop at a very special General Store when you use it. You can purchase Nero's exclusive special items and some HP or MP Recovery Potions, as well as recharge your stars and bullets.\nNero's exclusive special items include #chugely discounted Power Elixirs, Get Rich Chairs, and Inkwell Coins#. string.name: desc
string.value:
Combines potions and consumable items to refill HP & MP completely with each use.
- #cRight-click# the Potion Pot to open the genie window.
- Drag HP or MP recovery items into the item window.
- Check #cAUTOFILL# to charge the pot automatically when you loot compatible items.
- Equip to a quickslot, or to a pet's Auto HP/Auto MP Potion Pouch.
- Once expired, the pot remains in inventory.
- Use a #cRust Remover# to extend the pot's duration by 30 days.
- Use a #cPot Embiggener# to increase the pot's capacity.

string.name: desc
string.value: Use to permanently increase the Potion Pot's Storage capacity by one level(1000000). Hover your cursor over the Potion Pot's icon to view current capacity. Maximum capacity level: 9(10000000).

string.name: desc
string.value: Extends the life of an expired Potion Pot by 30 days. Only works on expired pots.

string.name: desc
string.value: Placing a new magic note on the magic harp gives #cone of the rare items#. Everytime the magic harp is used, the magic power is charged to the harp; Charging up to 100% triggers the Pever System to give significant possibility to win the special item of the month. #cDouble-click# the magic harp and place the #cNew Magic Note# in the popup window to get an item. The new magic note can be obtained from monster hunting or purchased from the grocery store in town.

string.name: desc
string.value: When pandora's key is inserted in pandora's box, #cone of rare items# can be obtained. Magical power is recharged everytime pandora's box is opened, when charged 100% fever system is invoked and #cdramatically increases the chance of receiving this month's special item#. Pandora's box can be used by a Double Click, and pandora's key can be obtained from monster hunt or from village goods store.

Masterpiece items come with #cpowerful stats# including Attack Power boosts. These items will match #cthe part and gender of the item that was used as the base#. (When capes or gloves are used as a base, either one can be obtained.) An equipment made as a #cMasterpiece# item #ccannot be traded#. \r\n#cMasterpiece# item rewards change once every season. (Check the MapleSEA announcement on the website for more details.)

(When capes or gloves are used as a base, either one can be obtained.) All equipment made as #cPremium Masterpiece# items #ccan be traded#. string.name: desc
string.value:
Combines potions and consumable items to refill HP & MP completely with each use.
- #cRight-click# the Potion Pot to open the genie window.
- Drag HP or MP recovery items into the item window.
- Check #cAUTOFILL# to charge the pot automatically when you loot compatible items.
- Equip to a quickslot, or to a pet's Auto HP/Auto MP Potion Pouch.
- Once expired, the pot remains in inventory.
- Use a #cRust Remover# to extend the pot's duration by 30 days.
- Use a #cPot Embiggener# to increase the pot's capacity.
